name: Hydra Password Guessing Hack Tool
description: Detects command line parameters used by Hydra password guessing hack tool
false_positives: Software that uses the caret encased keywords PASS and USER in its command line
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\-u\ * AND process.command_line:*\-p\ * AND process.command_line:(*\^USER\^* OR *\^PASS\^*))`
